Place of Birth: Vill. Kankoni Mehelol, Teh. Godhara, Panchmahal
Social And Cultural Activities: Organised programmes for social equality and rural development; took part in shramdan and made in-depth study of various evils in rural society like illiteracy, population explosion; malnutrition, court cases, alcoholism etc; development of rural areas and promotion of folk arts and culture
Profession: Political and Social Worker Agriculturist Educationist
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Agriculture, religious activities and religious music both vocal and instrumental
Educational Qualifications: Higher Secondary Educated at Shri K.K. High School, Vejalpur, Tel. Kalol, Distt. Panchmahal, Gujarat
Other Information: (i) The Telibiya Udpadak Sahkari Mandli Ltd. Mehlol; (ii) Jay Prannash Piyat Sahkari mandli Ltd. Pratappura; (iii) Arthaksham Seva Sahkari mandli Ltd. Mehlol; (iv)Khedut Anyay Nivaran Samiti Kalol; and (v) Sivam Education Trust kalol; , M.M. Gandhi Arts & Commerce College Kalol; Participated religious padyatra upto 13,000 km., 1962-72;
Name: Chauhan,Shri Prabhatsinh Pratapsinh
Positions Held:
1975
Sarpanch, Mehlol Garampanchayat

1975-80
Member, Taluka Panchayat Godhra

1980-90
Member, Distt. Panchayat Education Committee

1982-90 and 1995-2002
Member, Gujarat Legislative Assembly (four term)

1998-02
Deputy Minister, Forest & Environment, Govt. of Gujarat

2004-07
Minister of State, Tribal Development, Govt. of Gujarat

2004
Minister of State, Cow breading, Devsthan & Yatradham, Govt. of Gujarat

2009
Elected to 15th Lok Sabha

31 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Chemicals and Fertilizers
